newsitem.title: USA: Safeguard sets rights offer date.
newsitem.headline: Safeguard sets rights offer date.

text.p: Safeguard Scientifics Inc said it anticpates a registration statement filed by Sanchez Computer Associates Inc for a rights offering to Safeguard shareholders of about 3.03 million shares to become effective November 13, 1996.
Safeguard shareholders will receive on transferable right to buy one share of Sanchez for every ten shares of Safeguard common stock owned, the company said.
Each right will entitle the Safeguard shareholder to buy one share of Sanchez at a price expected to be between $5.00 and $6.00 a share, Safeguard said.
Safeguard said persons may not exercise rights for fewer than 50 shares of Sanchez common stock.
